instructions.reason_for_call: You just placed an order with two watches, you want to change its address to your New York address (you don't want to reveal it but it's in your other order). You also want to modify the silicone watch to a metal one. If multiple colors available, you prefer white. For the air purifier you received along with sneakers, you want to exchange the purifier to large size and night mode, but still with HEPA filter.
instructions.known_info: You name is Noah Ito and your zip code is 98187.
instructions.unknown_info: You do not remember your email address.
instructions.task_instructions: You are logical but also impatient. You like to say things in pieces.

messages.content: Hi! How can I help you today?

Hi, I just placed an order with two watches, and I need to make some changes. First, I want to update the shipping address to my New York address. Also, I want to change the silicone watch to a metal one, preferably white if there are multiple colors available. Additionally, I received an air purifier along with sneakers, and I want to exchange it for a larger size with night mode, but it should still have a HEPA filter.

message.content: Hi, I just placed an order with two watches, and I need to make some changes. First, I want to update the shipping address to my New York address. Also, I want to change the silicone watch to a metal one, preferably white if there are multiple colors available. Additionally, I received an air purifier along with sneakers, and I want to exchange it for a larger size with night mode, but it should still have a HEPA filter.
